releaseNotes:
• Faster, smoother performance powered by new Leaflet GL technology
• Windy Plugins now available on iPhone and iPad
• Expanded Airport POIs with enhanced METAR, TAF & NOTAM information
• Windy Premium: Faster Route Planner via ICAO/IATA search in the Search tab
• High-resolution local models added to widgets (iPhone, iPad, macOS, CarPlay)
• New precipitation type toggle in Settings
• Unified Dark Mode across the app, plus stability improvements and bug fixes
description:
A UNIQUE WEATHER FORECAST VISUALISATION
While most weather forecasting apps rely solely on free global models, Windy has gone a step further by investing heavily in the most accurate weather models available, always at the highest possible resolution, to deliver you the most accurate forecasts in the world.

LIVE WEATHER APP - WEATHER RADAR & SATELLITE
(Now with Precipitation Type & Lightning tracker)
Radar is a highly valued tool for weather forecasting. To provide you with the most accurate radar imagery, we constantly expand our resources so that rain, snow, and storms don't catch you by surprise.
Trusted radar sources include NOAA, Met Office, Météo France, DWD, JMA, IMD, BoM & more.
The global satellite composite is created from NOAA, EUMETSAT & Himawari data.

MORE THAN 50 WEATHER MAPS
- Rain radar, Satellite and a unique combined layer of Radar & Satellite images (blue, infrared, visible)
- Hurricane tracker, Weather warnings & Extreme forecast
- Wind forecast: Wind speed, Wind gusts & Accumulation, models comparison, data from live Weather stations
- Temperature: Humidity, Pressure, Dew point, live data from Weather stations
- Rain: Thunder & storms, Rain accumulation, Thunderstorms, Precipitation type, CAPE-index
- Aviation: Clouds, Cloud tops, Cloud base, Visibility (LIFR, IFR, MVFR, VFR), Fog, Icing, Clear air turbulence, Thermals, Freezing altitude
- Marine Forecast: Waves, Swell, Wave power, Tide forecast, Currents, Sea temperature
- Solar activity: Solar power, UV index, Wet-bulb temperature
- Snow: Snow depth, New snow, Snow density
- Air Quality: Air Quality Index (AQI) with Pollen (CAMS), NO2, PM 2.5, Aerosol, SO2, Ozone layer, Surface ozone, CO concentration, Dust mass
- Soil moisture, Moisture anomaly, Drought intensity, Fire Danger, Fuel moisture

MORE THAN 15 WEATHER MODELS
Global weather models:
- meteoblue - AI forecast
- ECMWF
- GFS by NOAA
- ICON by DWD

Local weather models:
- HRRR by NOAA
- NAM by NOAA
- HRDPS by MSC
- ICON-EU by DWD
- ICON-D2 by DWD
- UKV by Met Office
- AROME-HD by Météo France
- ALADIN by CHMI
- NEMS by meteoblue
- MSM by JMA
- ACCESS-C by BoM

LIVE RAIN, STORM ALERTS & CUSTOM WEATHER ALERTS
Want to know before the storm hits near you while you hike, bike or spend time outdoors? You can now access live weather alerts or set up your custom weather alert for wind, sunshine, or new snow.

HURRICANE TRACKER FOR STORM TRACKING
With Windy's hurricane tracker, you can track the past and projected path of a hurricane or a storm. Windy doesn't rely on just one hurricane model, but will give you all the forecasts available for a storm or hurricane.

WINDY MADE FOR PILOTS
- 16 altitude levels from the surface to 13.5km/FL450
- 50k+ Airports searchable by ICAO and IATA, including runway info, decoded & raw METAR, TAF & NOTAMs
- Detailed Airgram and Meteogram: temperature and dew point, wind speed and wind gusts, pressure, precipitation, altitude cloud cover, freezing altitude
- Thermals forecast
- Route planner

WINDY MADE FOR OUTDOOR SPORTS, SURF & BOATING
- 67K+ global webcams
- Summer & winter outdoor topographic maps by Mapy.com
- 4.5K+ Surfing spots
- 12.1K+ Paragliding spots
- 4.3K+ Kiting spots
- Boating tide forecast
- Sun & Moon tracker
- Plugins with buoy data

WINDY AS A WEATHER WIDGET ON YOUR DEVICE
Get the weather now on your iPhone, MacOS, iPad, CarPlay & Apple Watch, from forecast, Radar, METAR, Weather stations & Wind, ready for your travels and outdoor sports.

WINDY PREMIUM — FORECAST LIKE A PRO
- 1-hour & 15-day outlook with 4–6× daily updates
- Radar/Satellite 24h loops & 1-year archives
- More maps (Tide Forecast)
- Model comparison to find the best model

Terms of Use: https://account.windy.com/agreements/windy-terms-of-use
Privacy Policy: https://account.windy.com/agreements/windy-privacy-policy

GET IN TOUCH
Join us on social media or at community.windy.com to discuss weather-related topics, report bugs, or suggest a new feature. Contact us directly at info@windy.com.
